languages.text: "Как это ни прискорбно, Империум знает множество случаев, когда даже вернейшие последователи Кредо изменяли свету Его. Губернатор Вьятт постигла множество знаний, дабы превратить Янус в процветающий агромир. Быть может... одно из них и стало губительным".

"As lamentable as it may be, the Imperium's history knows many cases where even the most steadfast followers of the Creed would turn away from His light. Governor Vyatt had to tap into many founts of knowledge to turn Janus into a prosperous agri-world. Perhaps... one of those founts became her undoing."
languages.original_text: "Как это ни прискорбно, Империум знает множество случаев, когда даже вернейшие последователи Кредо изменяли свету Его. Губернатор Вьятт постигла множество знаний, дабы превратить Янус в процветающий агромир. Быть может... одно из них и стало губительным".

Governor Vyatt had to tap into many founts of knowledge to turn Janus into a prosperous agri-world. Perhaps... one of those founts became her undoing."

Governor Vyatt had to tap into many founts of knowledge to turn Janus into a prosperous agri-world. Perhaps... one of those founts became her undoing."

"As lamentable as it may be, the Imperium's history knows many cases where even the most steadfast followers of the Creed would turn away from His light. Governor Vyatt had to tap into many founts of knowledge to turn Janus into a prosperous agri-world. Perhaps... one of those founts became her undoing."

"As lamentable as it may be, the Imperium's history knows many cases where even the most steadfast followers of the Creed would turn away from His light. Governor Vyatt had to tap into many founts of knowledge to turn Janus into a prosperous agri-world. Perhaps... one of those founts became her undoing."

"As lamentable as it may be, the Imperium's history knows many cases where even the most steadfast followers of the Creed would turn away from His light. Governor Vyatt had to tap into many founts of knowledge to turn Janus into a prosperous agri-world. Perhaps... one of those founts became her undoing."

languages.text: 「悲しいことではありますが、帝国の歴史には、その信条の最も堅実な信者でさえも彼の光から背ける事例が多く存在します。ビャット総督はヤヌスを繁栄する農業惑星に変えるために多くの知識の源を利用せざるを得ませんでした。おそらく…その中のひとつが彼女の破滅の引き金となったのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "As lamentable as it may be, the Imperium's history knows many cases where even the most steadfast followers of the Creed would turn away from His light. Governor Vyatt had to tap into many founts of knowledge to turn Janus into a prosperous agri-world. Perhaps... one of those founts became her undoing."

traits.locale_text: 「悲しいことではありますが、帝国の歴史には、その信条の最も堅実な信者でさえも彼の光から背ける事例が多く存在します。ビャット総督はヤヌスを繁栄する農業惑星に変えるために多くの知識の源を利用せざるを得ませんでした。おそらく…その中のひとつが彼女の破滅の引き金となったのでしょう」

languages.text: « Aussi tragique que cela puisse être, il est arrivé au cours de l'histoire de l'Imperium que des fidèles dévoués au credo s'égarent et s'éloignent de Sa lumière. La gouverneure Vyatt a dû puiser dans de nombreuses sources de connaissances pour faire de Janus un agri-monde florissant. Mais peut-être que c'est l'une de ces sources qui a finalement causé sa chute. »
languages.original_text: "As lamentable as it may be, the Imperium's history knows many cases where even the most steadfast followers of the Creed would turn away from His light. Governor Vyatt had to tap into many founts of knowledge to turn Janus into a prosperous agri-world. Perhaps... one of those founts became her undoing."

traits.locale_text: « Aussi tragique que cela puisse être, il est arrivé au cours de l'histoire de l'Imperium que des fidèles dévoués au credo s'égarent et s'éloignent de Sa lumière. La gouverneure Vyatt a dû puiser dans de nombreuses sources de connaissances pour faire de Janus un agri-monde florissant. Mais peut-être que c'est l'une de ces sources qui a finalement causé sa chute. »

languages.text: “或许这很令人惋惜，但帝国历史上无数案例表明，哪怕是最坚定的追随者，也可能会背离神皇的明光。维亚特总督不得不利用各种各样的知识，才将加努斯改造成了繁荣的农业世界。或许……其中某个知识的源头，最终为她带来了灾祸。”
languages.original_text: "As lamentable as it may be, the Imperium's history knows many cases where even the most steadfast followers of the Creed would turn away from His light. Governor Vyatt had to tap into many founts of knowledge to turn Janus into a prosperous agri-world. Perhaps... one of those founts became her undoing."

traits.locale_text: “或许这很令人惋惜，但帝国历史上无数案例表明，哪怕是最坚定的追随者，也可能会背离神皇的明光。维亚特总督不得不利用各种各样的知识，才将加努斯改造成了繁荣的农业世界。或许……其中某个知识的源头，最终为她带来了灾祸。”

languages.text: «Por muy lamentable que sea, la historia del Imperium no es ajena a que los más fieles del Credo se aparten de su luz. La gobernadora Vyatt se vio obligada a recurrir a muchas fuentes de conocimiento para hacer de Janus un próspero mundo agrícola. Quizás... una de esas fuentes se convirtiera en su perdición».
languages.original_text: "As lamentable as it may be, the Imperium's history knows many cases where even the most steadfast followers of the Creed would turn away from His light. Governor Vyatt had to tap into many founts of knowledge to turn Janus into a prosperous agri-world. Perhaps... one of those founts became her undoing."

traits.locale_text: «Por muy lamentable que sea, la historia del Imperium no es ajena a que los más fieles del Credo se aparten de su luz. La gobernadora Vyatt se vio obligada a recurrir a muchas fuentes de conocimiento para hacer de Janus un próspero mundo agrícola. Quizás... una de esas fuentes se convirtiera en su perdición».

languages.text: "So beklagenswert es auch sein mag, es ist in der Geschichte des Imperiums oft vorgekommen, dass sich selbst die treuesten Anhänger des Glaubens von seinem Licht abgewendet haben. Gouverneurin Vyatt musste viele Wissensquellen anzapfen, um Janus in eine wohlhabende Agrarwelt zu verwandeln. Vielleicht ... ist eine dieser Quellen zu ihrem Untergang geworden."
languages.original_text: "As lamentable as it may be, the Imperium's history knows many cases where even the most steadfast followers of the Creed would turn away from His light. Governor Vyatt had to tap into many founts of knowledge to turn Janus into a prosperous agri-world. Perhaps... one of those founts became her undoing."

traits.locale_text: "So beklagenswert es auch sein mag, es ist in der Geschichte des Imperiums oft vorgekommen, dass sich selbst die treuesten Anhänger des Glaubens von seinem Licht abgewendet haben. Gouverneurin Vyatt musste viele Wissensquellen anzapfen, um Janus in eine wohlhabende Agrarwelt zu verwandeln. Vielleicht ... ist eine dieser Quellen zu ihrem Untergang geworden."

languages.text: "İçler acınası bir durum, evet ama İmparatorluk tarihinde, İtikat'a en sadık müritlerin bile O'nun ışığına sırt çevirdiği birçok vaka olduğu bir gerçek. Vali Vyatt, Janus'u müreffeh bir zirai dünyaya dönüştürmek için pek çok bilgi kaynağından yararlanmış olmalı. Belki... Onu felakete sürükleyen de bu kaynaklardan biridir."
languages.original_text: "As lamentable as it may be, the Imperium's history knows many cases where even the most steadfast followers of the Creed would turn away from His light. Governor Vyatt had to tap into many founts of knowledge to turn Janus into a prosperous agri-world. Perhaps... one of those founts became her undoing."

traits.locale_text: "İçler acınası bir durum, evet ama İmparatorluk tarihinde, İtikat'a en sadık müritlerin bile O'nun ışığına sırt çevirdiği birçok vaka olduğu bir gerçek. Vali Vyatt, Janus'u müreffeh bir zirai dünyaya dönüştürmek için pek çok bilgi kaynağından yararlanmış olmalı. Belki... Onu felakete sürükleyen de bu kaynaklardan biridir."
